title: Phoebe Chow, “Britain’s Imperial Retreat from China, 1900-1931” (Routledge, 2016)
description:
At the start of the twentieth century Britain’s relationship with China was defined by the economic and political dominance Britain exerted in the country as an imperial power, a dominance that would ebb over the next three decades. In Britain’s Imperial Retreat from China, 1900-1931 (Routledge, 2017), Phoebe Chow describes...
